## Installation

- Important: You must have installed the Node.js and Git

```bash
# clone it
$ git clone https://github.com/Wesley-AlvesRolim/coopers-server.git

$ cd coopers-server/

# Install dependencies
$ npm install

# Running scripts
$ npm run start:dev
```

- Make requests on http://localhost:3001
